Dear Marguerite:
I see by the submission form and by John Henderson*s draft of the nuser*sn
memoes that BOOKS ON REVIEW runs li; programs. However, at the recent Urbana
meeting I got the idea that there were 28. Can you give me the final wprcL - fi
on this? — /‘j’TAvC XHUyJ AtJt', IbtjLvJ jw^uLl^L Vfc /0 Xu.
i _ %-pLr > iti*. ^ 1 b
If there are li; programs in the series, by the way, the figures I sent you yes¬
terday are slightly off. The total charge for all the currently-being-processed
in-school programs is $176 at $2.00 per reel. This hardly changes the per pro¬
grams costs. The figures given were not 100$ accurate, but they were quite close.
I*m sorry I won*t be able to be at the Regional meeting — especially after having
enjoyed the last one I attended so much and after having repeatedly said that I
thought it was perhaps even more important that I go to more Regionals than to
Nationals. But that*s the day before I get married. Well, one way or another, 1*11
get a change of pace, I guess}
M
Sincerely,
4iU
